title: Golden Globe Awards Unveil Top 25 List of Podcasts Eligible for Inaugural Audio Award
summary: “Call Her Daddy,” “SmartLess,” “The Joe Rogan Experience” and “The Megyn Kelly Show” are among the top 25 podcast contenders eligible to compete for the inaugural Golden Globe Award for best podcast, to be presented at the 83rd annual awards ceremony in January. The field will be narrowed to six no…

title: Portable 1TB bamboo SSD is fast, but smells even better due to built-in aroma diffuser — essential oil diffuser billed as bringing harmony to your workplace
summary: Apacer launches the AS712 portable SSD, made from natural bamboo and reservoir silt and featuring an essential oil diffuser.
